content.detailedDescription:
traveling south on route 29 and 100 in the zionsville area of pa with my wife and 12 yr. old grandson we observed 4 bright lights in a loose formation.  this was approximately 2230 hrs.

 they appeared to be almost stationary and my first impression was they were japanese lanterns. but then they started changing positions and picking up speed. they rapidly appeared to be moving away from us.
 one was red and circular about the size of a small plane. the others were yellow/orange in color. they seemed to be smaller but the size of the glowing circles could not be determined due to the distance.  they went from being real bright to just star like dots in a short time.

 my wife thought they were a formation of planes but no lights were flashing on any of them. i began then to think they may have been ufo's due to the yellow orange ones changing positions which each other as the red one stayed the course se. my grandson thought to capture them on a sony tablet i owned but zoomed in making it impossible to to see all 4 at the same time. in a freeze frame i can see 3 of the 4 lights.

the video while zoomed in gave the lights a jerky and stretched appearance but in real time they were not. they were quiet and very smooth changing positions near the red light. we lost sight of the objects as they moved rapidly away and got lower to the horizon eventually being obscured by trees and low clouds. 
 afterwards i felt amazed at seeing something so clearly that i only had read about before. my wife felt they were ufo's  my grandson wanted to know who was inside them and felt a little fearful. the digital video can be submitted later once the table recharges if anyone wants me to post it.

i did read the report from jonestown and noticed the top formation of his pic looked like the same formation when i first saw it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 unknown lights 1 red  and 3 smaller yellow orange

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to  bring  in items from a yard sale we had and i looked up and saw a bunch of circles hovering in the distance and  yelled for my sister and her friend to  come  outside  and the freaked  out and grabbed there phones i ran in and grabbed my phone and tried to record with my iphone but the lights didn't show  all of a sudden it started moving towards us and as it got closer it looke more and more like a triangle. and then i could see the lights on my  iphone so i startled to record it passed over heard and continued on a path  south west
content.summary: Looked in sky look like circles hovering in the distance  then triangle

content.detailedDescription:
First and foremost, i am a freelance investigator (formerly member of mufon - ny chapter 2010-2011)....

on the morning of 6/14/2014, i had picked up my gf from work, and when we got home, she had informed me that, shortly after i had dropped her off, two orange orbs off in the distance, which, judging by location had to be over the towne of sherrill, or beyond, were hovering.  she and countless others were viewing it.  she had said 2-3 security officers were also witness and recording with mobiles, but wouldn't let me know who, or refuses to pass it on so i can interview them...

from her location, they were about 35-45 degrees into the air, at approximately 5-10 miles away, just hovering.  observation time was approximately 10 minutes until their shuttle bus came around.  no further action noted other than hovering, and no other craft nearby.  weather was cloudy with on and off periods of rain, but full moon peaking through now and then.
content.summary: Two hovering orange orbs, multiple witnesses....

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:30 p.M. est, i was out on my back porch swing, when i saw two very large, orange, round, and silent lights coming from the southwest over the buildings two blocks over toward the northeast. they looked like they belonged to one very large aircraft at first, flying too low and coming from the wrong direction. but there is a local airport, so i know very well what low-flying planes look and sound like. the lights then started to move west again, farther away from me, and i could see that they were moving separately. their flight was quite low, and as i watched them move farther away to the west they started to fade and then disappeared altogether.

then, around 10:40 p.M. est i saw another, singular orange light come from the southwest direction. it flew more slowly than the previous two, but seemed to follow their trajectory. just as the two before, as i watched it fly farther west before it faded and then seemed to disappear.

i have never seen anything like them in my life, and i grew up on air force bases. i am freaked out by this.
content.summary: Two low-flying, large orange lights appeared, flew west and disappeared, one more followed

content.detailedDescription: Was outside smoking a cigarette, looking up at a clear night sky. was trying to find orions belt when a moving star caught my eye from the west. first initial thought was that it could be a satellite, but object was moving too fast and appeared to me to be too low and too fast. it moved from west to east and pulsated several times with no pattern to the pulsations, was totally random. also i could see that it wavered as if under some sort of imperfect control. within two minutes after it was out of sight to the east, another one exactly like it came from the south with the exact same characteristics as the first but this one curved to the east a few degrees as it passed overhead. then came the fighter jets at full afterburner in formations of two, three formations crisscrossing in the area of the sighting.
content.summary: Pulsing star moved w. to e., then another s. to n., followed by fighter jets

content.detailedDescription:
The two of us had picked up a late dinner and had driven up to carter lake (the highest campground area) to eat it/stargaze. we were looking at what appeared to be a satellite when we noticed some erratically-fluttering red and white lights in a triangle formation. a second triangle appeared. the triangle shapes could not have been unified structures, however, because several more individual lights quickly appeared, all flickering between red and white, and all (including the initial triangles) began to travel south-to-southeast while moving smoothly, slowly, in various geometric formations. 

we saw that a small group of people by the lake were standing and gesturing with each other at the objects as well, but they were out of earshot. as we all watched, an easily-identified airplane made its way through the sky at a lower altitude than the other crafts, unaffected. 

at one point, i noticed a very low-flying light that flickered red and white as the others did slowly creeping over the treeline of a nearby foothill. i could see the light from the object reflected on the trees below, but there was no sound, beam, or trail. seeing it so low to the ground made me nervous, but within a minute it crept over the hill to the other side and out of view. 

after watching the closer object, we lost track of the other lights. the other witnesses had appeared to shift their attention back to their campsite, so we looked around the sky for a few minutes, saw nothing there, and left.
content.summary: Amazing flight formations over carter lake

content.detailedDescription: While driving, saw group of lights hovering together. began moving slowly together and disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Hovered, then moved slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was videotaping some lightning during and after a thunder storm just before 2 am. i had been shooting short videos with my cell phone when i noticed it on my screen and videotaped it. i had no idea what the object was. it seemed to be just hovering on top of a tree about two houses down. i was videotaping from upstairs. i noticed a blueish light emitting from and a few white lights before it took off quickly. i was quite intrigued and it scared me when it took off. i have no idea what it was. my husband and i were stationed in tinker air force base,oklahoma when it happened just 6 days before we moved to another base.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Caught after thunderstorm. object seemed to appear out of nowhere and hovered with a blue light emitting from it then took up abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: When just getting off of interstate 255 via exit 2 i noticed a metallic object in the sky. it was very brightly reflecting the sunlight. at first i thought it was a plane but the reflection of sunlight from it appeared very bright. the object appeared small but it did appear larger later on as it got closer. it appeared grey at a distance but then it looked black later on. it was very close to the jb bridge. the shape is hard to tell with how bright it was but it looked like it was the shape of an oval. the object was first far away from my location. there also appeared to be another object in the photos although i did not see it unlike the main object. they were nearly above the jb bridge. my son rapidly took 13 photos within a about 7 or 8 seconds. the objects traveled very quickly in a very short amount of time. it is hard to say how far they traveled because they appeared too far away to tell where they were precisely. they traveled way too fast to be planes or helicopters. they both moved north west toward me. they both traveled together too. they then started traveling south and they both left "streaks" in the sky. these streaks looked as if they were both at lower elevations than the objects were at. they both moved fairly quickly then but definitely not as fast as they did when traveling north west. i lost track of the object because i was just getting off of interstate 255. during the sighting i felt very excited but a little frightened to see such an unusual object. after the event i felt as if this had to be shared.
content.summary: Strange objects spotted near the jb bridge crossing the mississippi river. no lights or sound.

content.detailedDescription: Observed objects in the sky shortly after sunset while outside residence.Thought they may have been stars.Objects remained motionless.They emitted a reddish-white light which remained steady.
content.summary: Glowing reddish white objects

content.detailedDescription: Rounding curve before intersection i noticed bright lights ahead and the closer i got i saw bright lights on my left to discover a large object hovering over the top of rite aide pharmacy lights were so bright as i tried to keep my eyes on traffic and look at object and became anxious and started yelling in my car asking can anybody else see this.Traffic was so tight i could not stop because the traffic light was green and i had to keep moving and as i passed it i lowered my head to see that the bottom of object was flat and right on top of building but not touching it maybe 20 or 30 feet enough for me to see the trees in back ground.Two weeks before this i had a black substance fall on my car window shield that it was difficult to come off and 3 months later my car dash board lights went flashing crazy showing all types of messages alarms but dealership found no problems. now i have trouble sleeping and i panic during sleep and suddenly feel i am awaken by something i can not explain.
content.summary: Sited large object

content.detailedDescription:
In the early afternoon i was smoking and drinking a coffee in the terrace looking at the sky. there were some swallows flying in the summer sky and a hawk interested at them. the sky was clean and azure, except for a low soft cloud of some kilometers wide; height no more than a thousand meters from the ground. the sun was almost covered at the border of that cloud, so i could watch the sky and the hunt made by the hawk.

suddenly, i seemed to have seen a metallic reflection near the cloud. so i watched better at the sky, but i saw just a plane passing and the sun-white reflection on it. i thought it was that. but then i saw again another reflection near the cloud out of the corner of my eyes. so i began to gaze upon the cloud and after few seconds i saw a grey-steel metallic disk with a sphere inside of it, that classic ufo shape. that thing was visible for less than two seconds each time, was hovering like mad just below the cloud, performing curves similar to the boomerang path. each time the object exited from the shadow under the cloud, i could see it for 1.5/2 seconds. out of the shadow cloud the sun was reflected on it like in a common airplane. that white  reflected on metallic surface. so i saw his crazy curved direction for a couple of second then became completely invisible, and some seconds after i saw it exited in another point of the cloud. and so on for almost 5 minutes. ufo was running around madly under that cloud, and even itself was rotating. because was too fast and unpredictable, at a certain time i focused only on a side of the cloud so to see it clearly when passed.

i was very impressed by its form, its agility and speed. it was totally out of place, nothing of natural, nothing of human. it seemed fake to my eyes because i had ever experienced under the sun such a strange thing. a perfect sphere dressed in a perfect disk. elegant, amazing, charming, but in some way even terrible and wrong. i felt strange because of the implications of it on my life. i saw it clearly at least 4 times, and more than 10 out of the eyes corner. after almost 5 minutes, i stopped to see it. 

the way in which ufo became totally invisible let me with no words. simply invisible from a moment to the next. and i wonder why each time the direct light of the sun hit the ufo, it became visible for a couple of second. honestly now i saw clearly that they are here, but that invisibility can make me paranoid soon.

what is interesting is that even the hawk saw the ufo. near the beginnig, the hawk forgot about the swallows and went toward the cloud, flying always higher. when the hawk reached the border of the cloud remained stop up there for twenty seconds, that is, until the ufo appeared again from the cloud. after that, the hawk went down.

greetings.
content.summary: Classic disk with sphere in the center, hovering

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i went to legacy village to grab food when we observed heat lightning. so we started video tapping, because in cleveland heat lightning is very rare. i saw the object as i was starting at the sky filming. it moved from right to left very quickly and was very shaky. when i saw the object, i felt as if i had seen a ghost. i decided to tell and show my friend the video once we got in line for our food and we both agreed that the light was moving way to fast though the gust of heat lightning clouds, and way to shaky to be an airplane. the light eventually just disappeared behind the clouds. so i decided to report it and see what you guys thought.
content.summary: Was observing heat lightning

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing at the back door of my home, smoking a cigarette. the door faces roughly sse into the back garden.
    i noticed a series of what i deduced to be five lights in the se moving from left to right. my view was partially obstructed by a tree, so i had to observe these over roughly one minute and move from side to side to get a better view at first. then as most of the objects moved past the tree i could see them clearly.
    as i saw the first light i thought of an aircraft, but then realised this was not a usual aeroplane or helicopter. the light was solid and single ��� there was no variance in colour, nor was there any appearance of flashing, both of which i would associate with an aircraft.
    i then realised that there was more than one light and counted five. all appeared to be of the same colour and all were moving from left to right from my vantage point, which i assumed was consistent with objects floating in the wind, which immediately made me think of chinese lanterns.
    i have observed these objects before however, indeed i have used them myself and these did not appear consistent with my previous observations.
    firstly the lights were constant ��� there was no flickering such as you would get with the flame burning under a chinese lantern. this was the case until the objects faded from view in the sky.
    secondly, they were a pink/rose colour, not the usual orange/red i would associate with the flame on a lantern.
    thirdly, these objects did not look like they were drifting. they were moving quite quickly, quicker certainly than a typical jet-liner would move, although slower than a fighter jet.
    unlike a military or civil jet however, there was no noise, and i did listen for some. with five objects moving at once the cumulative noise should have been detectable at least, and considering the late hour of the sighting i do not believe the military would be flying jets this close to a town.
    the elevation of the objects was not the same, as if they were moving in line astern. their elevations varied from maybe thirty to forty degrees between them.
    as the objects moved directly in front of me (more or less to the south), they started to ���go out���. this at least would be consistent with a chinese lantern, although it did not look like a flame guttering. they simply dimmed from sight.
    at least one, possibly two had disappeared when i saw a sixth light moving into my field of vision from the w, which was white and slightly brighter than the others.
    this last light was to the south of me by some distance and at an apparent elevation of thirty five to forty degrees also. i believe its trajectory was from nw to sse. possibly my angle was confused however, as i���m reasoning it might���ve been moving from west to east, which would of course be consistent with some man-made orbital objects.
    however, this was a very bright object: brighter than any satellite i���ve ever seen. i don���t believe i���ve seen the iss as bright as this either. a cursory check of internet sources appears to show that the iss was currently over the southern indian ocean in any case, closer to australia than it is to england, which if correct would rule it out as an explanation.
    i can say that it was brighter than sirius and brighter than most manifestations of the planet venus, barring a direct opposition to earth.
    i can say with total certainty that its apparent magnitude was below zero. 
    this object traveled some way in a sw direction, ending up more or less directly to the s of me before it faded out. (in a manner consistent with the way satellites would fade.)
    by the time it faded out most of the pink coloured lights had also gone. at most only one or two were left and these faded out too, leaving the entire incident with an estimated duration of approximately two to three minutes.
    at the time i realised that these lights didn���t appear to be aircraft, satellites or chinese lanterns, i did call inside the house to try and get my parents and girlfriend to come out and see, however, none of them did.
    unfortunately i had no devices to hand which i could have recorded the incident with.

    i would like to request that whichever fi is assigned to this case that denise stoner be allowed a copy of this report and subsequent investigation data, as i have had dealings with this lady before and she holds a large amount of data on file about me. (she has been my fi with regards to a number of abduction incidents in my life.)
content.summary: Five bright red/organge lights and one bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to sleep late at night, passing near a window i saw a weird light in the horizon east. the light was really far and was too near to the ground and too bright for a star. so i waited almost 5 minutes watching at her to understand if it was moving or not. it was lower than the height of a mountain range in the horizon of which the height is 2100 meters. after that, i began to see the light clearly moving toward me, following the side of the mountain. 

in a couple of minutes that strong light was near enough to see that was an airplane. it flew low and slow, i heard the swish of the air and just a really soft sound of engine. not common. it had a blue light on the edge of a wing and a red on the other, whereas an airliner here has a green one and red one. then another double whit light flashing in the middle, and the strong light i saw in the horizon was what in a common airliner is called "taxi light" that is a beam of light used to land. the fact is that it was not a commercial airliner. it was incredibly huge and of the shape of a bat, with the wings that are curved toward in front (the opposite of a normal plane). the wings were enormous compared to the central part of it. the picture of a bat with open wings, that was the contour. at the end of the wings and near the center of it there was a some kind of missiles shapes.

my feeling was that i was seeing some kind of secret military vechicle, because following the direction where he came there's the biggest italian military base for the aviation (publicly known, north of a city called treviso) and the direction where he was going was the high part of the garda lake, where there are a strong military presence. i thought that it had some kind of trouble; i even thought that it was crashing because was really low and had that "light of landing." it was lower than the height of the mountains in front of me, so less than 2100 meters, almost 1500 meters i presume. it was so low that the lights of the villages and roads below, together with his own lights, allowed me to see him clearly, his shapes, those kind of missiles, grey color. i supposed that his owner had tried to mask the plane with those light, because i do not see the reason why a secret aircraft must have lights like all the other airplane, even if a little bit different. but with those lights, if that plane had been high in the sky nobody would notice it mistaking it for a common one. another thing i noticed is that there were no other planes in the sky while the aircraft was passing. the only airplanes that i saw were incredible far in the horizon and changed trajectory, this is never happened before. only after, i saw planes return as usual. this made me think again to a military approach. 

so, there was the biggest human flying vehicle i've seen in my life upon my head, really low flight, really low sound (the sound of air he was moving was stronger than the sound of his engine). seemed strange, i feared it would have crashed on another mountain in his path or on the ground. then came a ufo and everything found a sense.

i heard as an impact on the air, like sonic boom, and in the same time i saw a white flash that lighted the air in the direction of the sound. like the flash of a thunder, but without a thunder, and the sound was far, not so strong. i saw a dark object, too high to see a real shape. didn't seem big and in some way it was a compact object as a sphere, but i said was too far. that ufo was exactly in the path of the other aircraft, higher but really near. what made me mad is that the giant bat plane did not go away, but went suddenly toward the ufo, going upward. the ufo remained in the position for just few seconds and went away in up at the same point from which it came. again a far sonic boom, a white flash. ufo remained for not more than four seconds in total, from the first flash to the second. it went away out of the corner of my eye because i was watching the reaction of the aircraft. so the military aircraft went down again as before, made a great curve that i didn't understand why. here, that airplane was passing above my home. i went in a window to the other side of the home just in time to see the airplane disappear beyond the mountain horizon toward west. after few minutes i saw common airliners return.

greetings.
content.summary: Unknown military vehicle tries to hunt or avoid ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have experienced sleep paralysis on average 2 times per week since approximately 1994.  i have become accustom as to what to expect with sleep paralysis, what type of entities visit,  and what that particular experience should feel like.  in recent months, the events that occur alongside with sleep paralysis have been different and i feel it is of extra-terrestrial nature.

although i have had several experiences that i associate with extra-terrestrial occurrences throughout the nights, i will detail the most recent experience, which happened on march 22, 2014 around 2am.

i was falling asleep and sleep paralysis occurred.  but something was different this time. usually my eyes are open, and i wiggle my big toe, the entities go away (if any are present), and i wake up easily. the entities usually either are at the side of my bed ready to attack me, or just provide an evil presence at the door or at the head of my bed where i cannot visually see the entity.  

this time the experience was different.  i was laying on my back with my eyes closed (my eyes are usually easily kept open).  i started to wiggle my toe to wake myself up - but i didn't wake up. i realized my eyes were closed - so i opened them.  my eyes were unusually heavy, and it was a struggle to keep them open. 

at the foot of my bed there was an entity (usually the entities are, as mentioned above, not at that location).The entity was wearing a dark cloak which covered its face. it was approximately 5 feet tall. the skin was of darker shade and darker eyes.  

usually with sleep paralysis i do hear sounds (for example, footsteps, papers shuffling, voices, etc.).  this particular occurs had no sound whatsoever. no sounds from the entity, and no sounds from the light orb which i will now describe before i describe more detailed events of the entity.  

as the entity stood at the foot of my bed staring at me, i noticed a light orb at the intersection of my ceiling and door.  my eyes were still heavy and it was a struggle to keep them open.  the light orb was made up of about 20 small balls of light about the size of marbles. i "think" they were white, yellow, and blue.  the light orb hovered silently. it glowed. it was beautiful.

my blankets hovered off my body with the entity still at the foot of my bed. at this point i start to think that there are so many things different with this experience than what i am accustomed to.  the sense of evil presence was not there (whereas with sleep paralysis it always is there)- it was a rather unique experience. i was not afraid. my body began to hover about 2 feet off of the bed. i "think" my body made 2-3 spins in the air (in the motion a ceiling fan would).  at this time i am hovering at my window.  i remember my bedroom looking rather long and narrow than what it is supposed to look like.  the entity is closer to me now but not touching me. but there is a struggle of some sort at the window - not a struggle with me, as i was paralyzed from the start of the experience , but a struggle with the process. my eyes got so heavy i could not keep them open. that is all that i remember. i would love to know what happened next - i woke up in my bed, with my blankets off.  this is strange, as i am a person that even in the heat of the summer, i always feel that i need to have many blankets on me - and the blankets tend to always stay on me. this time, again, was different.

i did a watercolour painting of this experience. i will include if requested, however have not included it in this report.
content.summary: Entity at foot of bed, paralysis, attempt to abduct thru window, light orb was in room.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving down 275 towards beechmont-amelia exit when i seen what appeared to be a glowing red light/object. i knew immediately that this was nothing i had ever seen before. she however was not very amazed by it. i took a picture of this light with the iphone and when zoomed in on it, it was a perfect circle. we then ran an errand and on the way back through beechmont, she pointed out three or so of these lights that appeared to be hovering in place as one of them was darting back and forth from the other two as if trying to be protective of them. we missed our exit and turned around less than a minute later and these lights were gone. once in eastgate, we seen a white light moving slowly and we pulled over to get a look at this one and it stayed in place for about thirty seconds then started moving again fairly fast while making no sound. there are many airports in our area and i for one have never seen a plane or anything else for that matter that looked like this did.   i would love any information i could get on what i seen.
content.summary: Seen one solo near 275 then seen three scattered slightly near beechmont

content.detailedDescription:
It was spring and i was smoking a cigarette on the balcony of my home, near evening, before dinner, as usual. i observe the sky since always, because i love clouds and stars, so i was simply thinking, contemplating the firsts stars that come after the sunset. that day there was a low soft cloud in the sky that was moving fast, pushed by the wind. when the cloud disappeared, i saw some stars, but between them was one different.

i noticed a bright dot white/gold/yellow in the sky, really similar a star, but i had never seen a similar star in that point of the sky. it was too vivid, clear, lively. so i waited a couple of minute, watching that occurrence and lighting another cigarette. during those two minutes, the light seemed moving toward the earth, that is, it seemed to become bigger. but until then was just a sensation.

after those two minutes, it was clearly becoming bigger. it was getting close to the atmosphere. the first feeling was that a meteor was pointing me, even if it banal, i thought that and i was afraid. then that light drastically enlarged herself in few seconds, as a meteor does when entering completely in the atmosphere and the air attrition burns it in a great light, but it is not so big than that light.

so in those few seconds, it became from the size of a grain to the size of a globe wide than a half moon. after this it disappeared, without crush, flash or fragments, nor sounds (i live in a quite silent mountains region). it simply disappeared after being expanded.

so, for two minutes i observed a dot wide as a star in the sky, then for near thirty seconds it expanded until the size of a small grain, then in five seconds that thing became big as a little moon. then disappeared.

i started to feel that something was not ordinary when i saw happening again the same equal event, no more than forty seconds after the first. in the same exact way, in the same exact point of the sky, same direction. i felt as i had a dejavu. that dot in the sky was up there again, like the first, and did the same. i understood i wasn't so unlucky to see two meteors that mechanically pointed me, but it was something else, not natural.

the day after, at the same hour, all of this started again but with three differences: a) this time were three lights (or bright objects i cannot know). b) i saw this occurance from the beginning: i saw the first dot appears slowly in the sky beetween stars from nothing and the rest was the same of the day before. c) was in another position of the sky: a little bit right than the day before and the direction was no more directly toward me but a little bit off-axis compared to my position. i could observe this clearly when they became greater, and so, nearer. they had an almost lateral direction compared to me, so in the last part of their journey became clear they didn't point toward me. thanks to this, i saw they were not perfectly round lights and i'm not sure if inside that lights i saw something of grey, because when nearer and greater they were really radiant and i was not able to watch directly to them. then, the window of "near observation" lasted not enough seconds.

i didn't see other for some days, but near five days after i saw another one. this time i was late and i saw only one that was already enlarging himself. and there were thick clouds this time. the light/object was in another part of the sky on the right and again with another angle of direction compared to the horizon.

in the end, the first event had presented an angle of descent between 45 and 55 degrees respect to the horizon, the second near 60 and the third almost 70. the events were each time more to the right and in some way farther in relation to longitude. looking at them i was looking in the west horizon. those things disappeared at a height of more than 5000 meters. (first event cloud's height near 3000 meters, third event cloud's height 4000 meters. they disapperad above the clouds height. pretty sure of this, in the first and second event they were not covered by clouds.)

at that time, i was a little bit shocked from all of this. because no natural phenomenon acts in that way. a meteor swarm entering in the atmosphere breaks in a lot of pieces, produces a sound similar to the sonic boom of a jet plane, and of course does not follow an exact rythm of entry: one by one in a row, at the same distant, with regular intervals. then meteors emit lights only for the friction in the atmosphere and are not visible before, so we should talk about a unique swarm of comets that is hard to think and never been spotted.

anyway, i observed that the apparent different directions and positions were not by chance. they followed the movement of the planet. in other words, if we were on a space vehicle that is "parked" in a certain position of the solar system, remaining stopped we should see the planets move slowly and round. from there, if we shot an arrow each day at the same hour aiming to a certain coordinate of the solar system, presuming that in that moment in that coordinate there is the earth, so each day we should hit a different part of the earth accordingly to his rotation and movement. the entries of those lights/object followed this approach. they didn't change their coordinate, it is the planet that was moving.

i hope all of this helped.
greetings.
content.summary: Regular entries of two, three and one lights (bright objects) consecutive respectively three near days. same method, same distance, mathematical scheme of movement.

content.detailedDescription:
That day my wife and i take i walk on night 10.40. pm and i see a light on sky at 90 to 100 ft  near my house  the light is so bright  and only in sky light round is display  
then i and my wife is go after him but it is  go from our area then we went home but my wife brother and his wife go for taking ice cream to the airport  that airport is near to my house 2.5km when they r near to  airport they sow that light to heading to airport  area and is decipeard  that the story
content.summary: Mi ind wife r take a walk on that  night and i see a light(bright)  on sky the light heading on towords  slowly very slowly

content.detailedDescription:
After work, a friend and i went out side to view the full super moon.  a few minutes into it we first she a very bright white/yellow light glide across the sky.  questioning what it was. we'd assume plane.  but the light and brightness of it just wasn't right.  it also seemed to be heading up in like a 45 degree angle. already being very high in the sky.  curious we continue to observe the sky some more.  then a bright white/yellow light came from one direction. gliding across the sky.  watching it thinking "ufo or not". bam! the thing stops abruptly and starts going back the way!  at the same moment another smaller red light crosses past it.  the bigger white light comes to a stoping point in the sky and hovers for awhile.  it would occasionally move doing tiny wiggly moves. up and down.   eventually it moved up, higher in the sky.  it became smaller and more dim.  we watched it for awhile just hovering.  realizing to ourselfs that how right now it just would seem like a star.  but that's far from what it is!  it hovered and occasionally made small movements.  after about 30 mins it was still out there.  after viewing this event.  i'm a little shocked, disbelief. the way this thing moved.  something's intelligent is controlling it and as far as in aware.  nothing of earth is capable. i hope one day i can have some answers.  people are right.  look up to the sky.  

note:  there were times that i thought i could see a very light, hazy triangular shape.  but, it was very hard to tell.  and i of course was staring at this light for quite some time
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 orb/stars.  flying in crazy patterns in the sky. hovering. changing altitude

content.detailedDescription: As i was taking trash out at my church i observed one red twinkling light so bright looked like a fireball  to the west as it was passing over my direction,i thought it might be new military plane they were testing, two more light appeared couple hundred feet apart as i was watching those three i looked to see first object where i seen it and it was gone, dissapeared looked back at other two objects they were closer to me now traveling same height and speed then three more appeared in a v formation,all maintaned same height and speed together,as they past the light were twinkling from orange to red and decreased in size and intensity and then when got over school lights dissapeared one by one, there was no sound at all,it was the most amazing thing ive ever seen the light was so bright, totally blew my mind
content.summary: 6 red lights in formation  got brighter as passed over me then dissapeared over school

content.detailedDescription:
I experienced protracted strobe-like lights from an unidentifiable airial source while traveling west on sr 8 near mccleary, wa between approximately 47.049197, -123.237347 and 47.044459, -123.256487. the event occurred around 11:10pm pst and lasted for approximately 15-20 seconds. 

i was traveling with my mother. she was driving approximately 65 mph; i was in the backseat resting. after turning a corner and entering a dark stretch of road, we both noticed a prominent white light behaving in a strobe-like manner in the car's interior. we assumed that a state patrol officer was pulling us over for speeding, even though the light was just white. as the light continued, we noted that no automobiles were visible from any direction and no sources of light were visible from beyond the trees that line sr 8. the light seemed to move about our vehicle's interior while flashing. it was visible in both the front and rear sections of the car. prior to seeing the light, the car's interior was only illuminated by dashboard controls. after the light stopped, the car's interior illumination returned to baseline. 

after the light stopped, we slowed the car dramatically to examine our surroundings. we could not detect noise or lights that would commonly be associated with aircraft; we could not discern sources of direct or refracted light from the roadside. weather was slightly overcast yet fair; the moon was covered by clouds and did not provide significant illumination; we did not experience lightning or adverse weather events. we did not have electronics in the car that could have accidentally emitted light: my mother's cellphone was off and my iphone lost its charge about 20 minutes prior to the light. the car functioned perfectly throughout the ordeal and its clock matched my watch with no indication of "lost time."

after returning home, we roughly approximated our experience by shining a cellphone flashlight on the roof of the car in the dark and oscillating it quickly. we are considering the possibility that something emitted light onto the roof of our car - from above - during the event.
content.summary: Light emission from unidentified source on state route 8

content.detailedDescription: A while after dinner on an early summer evening while watching tv in the living room i heard my mother call me from the front door. she was pointing to the low skyline and what i witnessed threw me for a loop and haunts me to this day. there above in the low skyline was a couple of objects in a semi-circular formation gliding slowly in a way i never witnessed before or since. their formation was too perfect and there was absolutely no sound or exhaust of any kind emitted. initially my thoughts were i was looking at a helicopter formation except we did not hear any sound whatsoever. and their shape was unlike any plane or jet i ever saw. their shape from the rear was hard to pinpoint but was slightly circular possibly oval(the years gone by have diminished my exact remembrance of their shape). there was a slight reddish and dim white glare or haze from the rear which appeared to cover most of the rear of these objects and hindered your ability to pinpoint their shape exactly. my mother was speechless and i heard my neighbors children scream "mom dad ufo". when our neighbors father came to their front porch he looked up and said "holy s**t" he told his son to go get the camera fast. the formation was gliding not flying(if that makes any sense)and seemed to be in no rush to get somewhere. my heart was pounding through my chest and i remember asking my mom what did she think. she replied something to the affect of i think their goddam ufo's. we lived within four miles of the former dow air force base in bangor maine(was de-commissioned in the late sixties to early seventies)and reopened as an air national guard base until this day. so we witnessed jets and various military aircraft flying over our houses every day. also the bangor airport is on the air guard base. the air national guard base in bangor maine is a major radar sight(over the horizon to be exact) so i've always wondered if these ufo's were picked up by that radar. i must also add that i served three years in the us army(1994-1997) as a stinger missile crewmember and as such had to be certified to identify multitudes of aircraft. never saw any aircraft before or since like those that summer day. unfortunately no pictures were taken that i am aware of because it was over so fast and we were literally stunned. i am only interested in finding out if this was witnessed by anybody else that evening or was it possibly reported. i was afraid of not being believed so i did not report this incidence.
content.summary: Flawless formation no sound or exhaust emitted/glare from rear/glide

content.detailedDescription: Went with family for our nightly walk. we are on a flight path, but this object looked brighter, i thought a plane was on fire.  my husband saw it too, but said it was just a plane and was not on fire. it was traveling in a straight line at about the speed of a small plane.  a few seconds after we noticed it, it slowed down, almost stopped.  then, completely dissappeared on a clear full moon night.
content.summary: Saw ball of fire, husband said it was a plane, it slowed to a almost stopped position until it dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv when wife said, "what's that?" and pointed out window. looked to see a bright reddish-orange light, approx the size of a baby aspirin held at arms length, traveling on a slightly descending path from the from the west/northwest almost toward us. we got up and went out the front door to observe, no sound was audible. the object seemed to travel somewhat slowly and seemed to be somewhat irregular in path but not dramatically so, perhaps just slightly. we then noticed a 2nd light of the same color in the distance to the north, and the object or light we first spotted seemed to turn northward and follow it. the 2nd, more northern light soon faded and disappeared, likely due to entering/passing through the light hazy cloud layer, although it was mostly clear out. asked the wife to grab her ipad to take video but when held up against the night sky we could not locate the item on the screen. the first object then turned in a more northern direction following the other light and quickly disappeared from sight. the objects were somewhat star-like in appearance, in that they sort of had that 'twinkling' appearance, but not as much as a regular star. they were reddish-orange in color. the colors and brightness did not change when the object changed directions, it stayed constant. strangest thing we've ever seen, and feel confident they were not fixed-wing aircraft or helicopters.
content.summary: Silent reddish-orange lights (2) following each other in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
2 light orbs over ken caryl area in se direction
2 light orbs moving slowly together across sky. 
one was larger with more red/white and pulsated and the other white and star-like; both moved across the sky in tandem. ran inside to get the video camera which could of only taken about 30 seconds, but they were gone by then. very interesting because something suddenly gave me the feeling to go outside and look for some ufos and it was there!
content.summary: 2 light orbs over ken caryl, co area in se direction

content.detailedDescription: I was cumming from a friends house on the same road i used to live on, and i was leaving about midnight on my way in town about 1/2 a mile from his house heading east on new valley road, marysville rye township i was coming up the  hill when a car passed me flashing his high beams over and over. he must of been going 30 mph faster then the speed limit. i was confused at 1st untill i got over the hill and past the trees i could see in the sky at 1st it looked like it was in space shaped like an arrow facing north then before i knew it it was right on top of me to the north a little bit and it was treetop level and i got out of my car and looked up and with in 5 seconds of getting out of my car the 7 light orbs that made up this arrow shaped craft turned 180 degrees facing right at me and i was still in shock at that time i was still watching untill what i thought was some kind of arrow shaped craft made up of the 7 lights broke in to 7 diffrent crafts that went diffrent ways at 1st and i jumped back in my car i stepped on the gas as fast as i could and 1 of the orbs came right up on my left bumper in less then a few seconds and i could see the other 6 lights over the trees to the north on my way in to town i was flying up new valley hill as fast as my car would take me. i had about 2 miles to drive to get to town. the orb fallowing me and the orbs fallowing me and the other orb continued untill i got in to a more populated area where there was meny houses and a trailer park i seen the orv on my left rear bumper shoot off north of the trees and connect with the other 7 orbs and thay went north west as fast as my eyes could fallow. this was the scary'st  thing i have ever experienced in my life. i was not a believer of ufo stuff but ever since that day i just cant stop thinking about it. please contact me  and tell me i am not alone on what i saw in the sky that night. thank you
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 7 arrow shaped lights turned towards me and broke in to 7 different lights and 1 fallowed me 2miles

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside my friends' garage, to the driveway and looked up to see a light passing over moving from the south toward the north. as i focused on it, wondering: plane? satellite?.. it gave a distinct single pulse burst which seemed to be directed at me. i contemplated calling to my friends but in another moment: it flashed again, a definite 'signal' which gave me a feeling of acknowledgement as it passed overhead. i turned to watch it cross the sky, but it faded out as it reached the center area up above. it left me with a good feeling. mysterious, beautiful, and definitely intelligently guided. although it lasted only a moment, i feel it will stay with me: another brief encounter with our 'neighbors' whom apparently are too busy to come hang out but occasionally like to give me the equivalent of a 'wink' or a 'high-five'.
content.summary: Bright ball of light pulsed twice before vanishing in the night. it felt telepathic.

content.detailedDescription: Outside walking my dog and noticed a bright red round object moving slowly straight across the sky and then faded out when directly above me.  then more objects appeared and followed the same basic flight path.  they were all going straight but wavered slightly side to side in their flight path.  some were almost side by side but all appeared to be moving at the same speed and in the same direction.  saw a total of about 10 of these lights.  no sound and appeared to be very high but not 100% sure.  they were bright red orange and fuzzy around the edges and varied slightly in brightness.  a pulsation of sorts.  then they stopped coming and that was it.  i knew these were not airplanes and just not sure what they were.  nothing i have ever seen before.  once the objects were directly overhead they faded out but one faded out while it was coming at us and before it was at 90 degrees.
content.summary: Bright red objects moving from north to south and going dark when 90 degrees above me

content.detailedDescription: I set up a game camera at the wash behind my house to capture puma movement in the area.  at 4:29 am on april 29th it captured a diagonal object that appears to be a twisted ribbon and at the same time an arc of dots in the background.  the camera uses infra red so objects close appear white.  a bush in the foreground appears to be shaking violently as it is blurred.  the camera detects movement and records at 15 second intervals.  another pic was taken 1 hr later, but nothing unusual.
content.summary: Like a twisted ribbon & dots in an arc. capured on game camera.
